README:
This is part of a project on a more scalable algorithm for the Stochastic Block Model.
See https://sites.google.com/site/aaronmcdaid/sbm and our arXiv document (details below).
Our paper is under review at a journal at the moment.

The data files used in our paper [2] in section 6.3 ("Larger networks") are very large.  So I have created this Makefile to generate the data locally, and optionally to run our SBM code on it. The source code for our algorithm is also online [1].


Three make commands, to be run in order:
   make generate_data # using the commands in parameters.txt to create folders with synthetic networks in them.
   make run_sbm       # for each folder that is specified in parameters.txt, run the SBM for 10,000 iterations.
   make make_table    # print the runtime and number of iterations until the correct result is reached.


Footnotes/References:

[1] https://sites.google.com/site/aaronmcdaid/sbm
[2] "Clustering in networks with the collapsed Stochastic Block Model"

http://arxiv.org/abs/1203.3083
